name: Untitled Survival Horror
description:
A project I've been working on. The game is an FP survival horror with the intent to give more information about mental health while also giving a good experience that raises the hair on the back of your neck.

As it stands it's barely a proof of concept, but many of the mechanics are in the game and I'll be spending a lot of time working on when I'm free.

The only goal is to find a key to unlock the door at the end of the hall on the right, once inside you can press a button and that ends this basic prototype. Otherwise, play around with items and juggle the 3 bars in the top left.

WSAD - Move

Left Mouse - Toggle Flash light

Ctrl - Crouch

Tab - Toggle inventory

Esc - Toggle pause 

Shift - sprint

Space - Stop to meditate lowering anxiety over time
